# Tournament Feedback Vertex Set (TFVS)

Input: A tournament $T, w: V(T) \rightarrow \mathbb{N}$.

Task: Find $S \subseteq V(T)$ s.t $T - S$ is acyclic \& ${\color{indianred}w(S):=\sum_{\sigma \in S} w(v)}$ <span style="color:indianred;">is minimized</span>.

:::

Suppose:

$$
|\text{OPT}| \geqslant n \cdot 0.6
$$



:::
